languages.text: {n}Каллигос моргает от удивления и вдруг заходится смехом.{/n} "Осторожнее! Я готов иметь дело с горячими головами, равно как и рубить их".

traits.locale_text: {n}Каллигос моргает от удивления и вдруг заходится смехом.{/n} "Осторожнее! Я готов иметь дело с горячими головами, равно как и рубить их".

languages.text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter.{/n} "Careful! I am as ready to do business with hotheads as I am to hack them off."
languages.original_text: {n}Каллигос моргает от удивления и вдруг заходится смехом.{/n} "Осторожнее! Я готов иметь дело с горячими головами, равно как и рубить их".

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter.{n} "Careful! I am as ready to do business with hotheads as to cut them off."

{n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter.{/n} "Careful! I am as ready to do business with hotheads as I am to hack them off."
{n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter.{/n} "Careful! I am as ready to do business with hotheads as I am to hack them off."

languages.text: {n}Calligos parpadea sorprendido y de repente estalla en carcajadas.{/n} «¡Cuidado! Estoy tan dispuesto a hacer negocios con individuos impulsivos como lo estoy a hacerlos pedazos».
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter.{/n} "Careful! I am as ready to do business with hotheads as I am to hack them off."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos parpadea sorprendido y de repente estalla en carcajadas.{/n} «¡Cuidado! Estoy tan dispuesto a hacer negocios con individuos impulsivos como lo estoy a prescindir de ellos».

languages.text: {n}卡利戈斯惊讶地眨眨眼，随后突然大笑起来。{/n}“那你得当心点！我喜欢和急脾气做生意，但我也同样喜欢把他们的脑袋砍下来。”
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter.{/n} "Careful! I am as ready to do business with hotheads as I am to hack them off."

traits.locale_text: {n}卡利戈斯惊讶地眨眨眼，随后突然大笑起来。{/n}“那你得当心点！我喜欢和急脾气做生意，但我也同样喜欢把他们的脑袋砍下来。”

languages.text: {n}Calligos cligne des yeux de surprise, puis éclate de rire.{/n} « Méfiez-vous ! J'aime autant m'associer à des têtes brûlées que les couper en deux. »
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter.{/n} "Careful! I am as ready to do business with hotheads as I am to hack them off."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos cligne des yeux de surprise, puis éclate de rire.{/n} « Méfiez-vous ! J'aime autant m'associer à des têtes brûlées que les couper en deux. »

languages.text: {n}カリゴスは驚いて目を瞬かせ、突然笑い出した。{/n}「気をつけろ！短気な相手とは、取引をするのも、そいつの首を切り落とすのも、どちらの用意もしているからな！」
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter.{/n} "Careful! I am as ready to do business with hotheads as I am to hack them off."

traits.locale_text: {n}カリゴスは驚いて目を瞬かせ、突然笑い出した。{/n}「気をつけろ！短気な相手とは、取引をするのも、そいつの首を切り落とすのも、どちらの用意もしているからな！」

languages.text: {n}Calligos blinzelt überrascht, bricht dann plötzlich in Gelächter aus.{/n} "Vorsicht! Ich bin ebenso bereit, Geschäfte mit Hitzköpfen zu machen, wie sie abzuschlagen."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter.{/n} "Careful! I am as ready to do business with hotheads as I am to hack them off."

traits.locale_text: {n}Calligos blinzelt überrascht, bricht dann plötzlich in Gelächter aus.{/n} "Vorsicht! Ich bin ebenso bereit, Geschäfte mit Hitzköpfen zu machen, wie sie abzuschlagen."

languages.text: {n}Calligos, şaşkınlıkla gözünü kırparak aniden kahkaha patlatıyor.{/n} "Dikkatli ol! Asabi kimselerin tekliflerini değerlendirmeye de kafalarını koparmaya da aynı derecede hazırımdır."
languages.original_text: {n}Calligos blinks in surprise and suddenly bursts into laughter.{/n} "Careful! I am as ready to do business with hotheads as I am to hack them off."
